Text: Ashley Tarasiewicz
The RTF written out to a file can be opened in Microsoft Word
Paging of the table works appropriately
Changes to document level margins are reflected in the output document
Changes to document level header and footer height are reflected in the output document
Changes to document level page size are reflected in the output document
Changes to document level orientation are reflected in the output document
Changes to document level default font size are reflected in the output document
Changes to document level default font are reflected in the output document
Changes to document level header rows are reflected in the output document
Changes to document level column header buffer are reflected in the output document
Changes to document level ignore cell padding are reflected in the output document
Titles and footnotes can be manually entered in the RTF document creation
Titles and footnotes can be manually entered using add_titles/add_footnotes
Titles and footnotes can be manually entered importing from a separate file using a reader
PAGE_FORMAT for titles and footnotes works properly
DATE_FORMAT for titles and footnotes works properly
FILE_PATH for titles and footnotes works properly
Bold titles/footnotes attributes update correctly when specified
Italic titles/footnotes attributes update correctly when specified
Align titles/footnotes attributes update correctly when specified, i.e. split titles/footnotes flush left and right as expected
Font titles/footnotes attributes update correctly when specified
Font size titles/footnotes attributes update correctly when specified
Index titles/footnotes attributes update correctly when specified, i.e. specified indices sort appropriately when entered in separte orders, NULL indices sort last
View functions (i.e. view_titles and view_footnotes) render data frames appropriately
Updates to huxtable table bold table level property is properly formatted in the resulting RTF
Updates to huxtable table italic table level property is properly formatted in the resulting RTF
Updates to huxtable table alignment (center, left, right) table level property is properly formatted in the resulting RTF
Updates to huxtable table vertical alignment (center, top, bottom) table level property is properly formatted in the resulting RTF
Updates to huxtable table table width table level property is properly formatted in the resulting RTF
Updates to huxtable table column width table level property is properly formatted in the resulting RTF
Updates to huxtable table row height table level property is properly formatted in the resulting RTF
Updates to huxtable table cell merging table level property is properly formatted in the resulting RTF
